projects.title: Open Care
projects.description: Scalable health-tech platform connecting patients, doctors, and organizations in Bangladesh. Comprehensive healthcare management system.

projects.title: Election Management System
projects.description: Robust system for managing elections, including candidate registration, center processing, and results tabulation.

projects.title: Exam Management System
projects.description: Java-based system serving 30,000+ students with real-time dashboards, Crystal Reports, and optimized performance using Redis.

projects.title: National Electronic Government Procurement System (e-GP)
projects.description: Large-scale government procurement platform with secure file handling, advanced data modeling, and integrity features for transparent procurement processes.
